The sterilizer has three possible configurations for different sized loads: convenient full-size mode, efficient compact mode, and quick microwave mode. Sanitize up to six bottles including nipples, cap rings and lids when the sterilizer is in full-size mode. Efficiently sterilize bottles in compact eco mode, which requires 30% less time and energy. Or use microwave mode for the quickest sanitizing cycle (4 minutes at 1,000 watts). Keeps objects sanitized for 24 hours if the cover remains unopened.  The Chicco NaturalFit 3-in-1 Electric Modular Sterilizer Features:   Quiet operation, automatic shut-off   Holds up to 6 NaturalFit bottles   Kills up to 99.9% of harmful household germs   Compact eco setting   Digital information display    The largest baby brand in Europe, Chicco takes the happiness of children seriously. Chicco developers blend real-world knowledge with cutting-edge research, discovering the most ideal color of a toy, the best ergonomics of a stroller, or the definitive safety of a baby seat. Chicco provides mothers and children with simple, state-of-the-art solutions to improve everyday life and help them grow happily. Babies""R""Us has a great selection of  Chicco  items !  Visit our   Chicco   brand page to check out even more superior baby products and registry must-have items."

description: Playtex Nurser Newborn Feeding Set with Drop Ins Liners provides benefits that mom and baby will enjoy. Disposable Drop-Ins Liners make this bottle easy to use & easy to clean, and provide a comfortable feed for baby. As baby feeds, you can see the soft liner collapsing to prevent air from mixing with milk and getting into baby's tummy. This means less gas and less discomfort for baby.        Convenience is key! We developed the Nurser with easy to use, pre-sterilized, disposable liners. The liners collapse like the breast to help prevent air from mixing with the milk and entering baby's tummy to help reduce gas and discomfort. Optional Angled Design: Angled position promotes semi-upright feeding which is recommended by pediatricians to help prevent ear infections. The bottle is uniquely designed to reduce colic. 100% Guaranteed Leak Proof Seal: The Twist 'n Click seal helps prevent spills and leakage. Convenient, disposable liners are the perfect solution for a busy mom on-the-go. The Nurser with Drop Ins Liner is compatible with all Playtex nipples and caps for greater feeding flexibility. It's easy to mix and match bottles and nipples for the perfect combination that fits your babies evolving preferences. All Playtex Nurser with Drop Ins Liners bottles come standard with a Playtex NaturaLatch Silicone nipple. Designed to be most like mom, the NaturaLatch nipple encourages proper latching and promotes healthy, active feeding.  The Playtex Premium Nurser with Drop-Ins Liners Newborn Feeding Gift Set Includes:   2-4 ounce Nurser Bottles with NaturaLatch Silicone Nipples   2-8 ounce Nurser Bottles with NaturaLatch Silicone nipples   30 Pre-Sterilized 4 oz Drop-Ins Liners   30 Pre-Sterilized 8 oz Drop-Ins Liners.
title: Playtex Premium Nurser with Drop-Ins Liners Newborn Feeding Gift Set

description: Teething jewelry that's always in easy reach, keeping Baby happy and Mom looking great! Or even the pieces of your broken necklaces. Bitey beads are strong and super safe. Made of 100% food grade silicone, free of lead, BPA and Phthalates. The soft pressure on babies gums helps relieve teething pain. And not to mention that look great on mom too! Wear Bitey Beads jewelry while breastfeeding to give your baby something to keep their hands occupied (other than you!) This can help keep babies attention leading to longer feeding times. **Please do not leave them with your baby unsupervised. Bitey Beads are intended to be worn by adults only. Discard and replace them at the first sign of wear or damage. Features:   100% food grade silicone.   Free of BPA, Lead, or other heavy metals.   Breakaway clasp for added safety. description: Philips AVENT SCF573/33 Classic+ 9 Ounce Pink bottles with colorful butterfly design promotes the health and comfort of your baby. This BPA free bottle is proven to reduce colic and fussiness, especially at night.  The unique valve integrated into the nipple flexes to allow air into the bottle, preventing vacuum build up, and preventing air into your baby's tummy. The valve on the Classic+ nipples also flexes to your baby's feeding rhythm so milk only flows at your baby's pace to minimize overeating and spit-up, burping and gas.  The extra soft silicone nipple is available in different flow rates for babies of all ages. With few parts, rounded edges and wide neck, the bottle is easy to clean thouroughly.  Ease of cleaning helps to ensure more hygienic, healthier feeding. The Classic+ feeding bottle works interchangeably with most of the Philips AVENT range making it easier to meet your growing baby's changing needs.  We recommend to use the Classic+ bottles only with the Classic+ nipples.
title: Philips AVENT 9 Ounce Classic+  Bottles 3-Pack - Pink Butterflies

description: Truly orthodontic pacifiers created with dental experts. Nipple gently expands in the mouth to support baby's palate for a natural fit. The nipple gently flexes and stretches in the mouth for ultimate comfort. BPA and Phthalate Free.  The Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature 0-6 Months 2 Pack Every Day Pacifier - Pink Deco Features:   Sized 0-6 months and specially designed for baby acceptance the first time   Symmetrical orthodontic shape   Traditional shield style in classic, understated colors   BPA and phthalate-free silicone    Tommee Tippee is the number one brand of infant and toddler feeding products in Great Britain. Since 1965, Tommee Tippee has earned a reputation for its clever ideas, product quality and simply intuitive designs that promote natural development at every age, stage and feeding need. These smart ideas have earned the company top ranks in the prestigious Mother and Baby awards - a head-to-head assessment of competitive products voted on by moms themselves. In fact, The Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature line of baby bottles has been chosen as Great Britain's best baby bottle winning the Gold Award in 2006/7, 2008/9 and again in 2009/10.  Today, Tommee Tippee innovations provide comfort for babies and peace of mind for parents in 45 countries around the world.
title: Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature 0-6 Months 2 Pack Every Day Pacifier - Pink Deco

description: The NUK 3-in-1 Fashion Pacifier Clip brings together design and function in the first interchangeable pacifier clip. The 3-in-1 Fashion Pacifier Clip comes with three interchangeable fabric strips so you can customize your babies look! The NUK 3-in-1 Fashion Pacifier Clip is designed to be easy to use with a clasp that is easy to open and close with only one hand and conveniently attaches to both button and puller pacifiers. The NUK 3 in 1 Fashion Pacifier Clip 3 Pack features:   NUK 3-in-1 Fashion Pacifier Clip comes with three interchangeable fabric strips in designs to match babies every outfit.   Features a clip that is easy to open and close with only one hand.   Convenient to use with both button and puller pacifier styles.    About NUK Over 55 years ago, NUK invented the orthodontic shape pacifier to mimic the natural shape of mom's nipple while breastfeeding. This makes for easy transition from breast to pacifier and back. The nipple is asymmetrical to best naturally fit baby's pallet, which helps promote Healthy Oral Development.  NUK now features an improved nipple and based on research, this improved nipple calms and soothes baby better than our original nipple. It has a scooped nipple cavity for maximum tongue movement, integrated channels for less palate pressure and still features our great heart shaped shield that prevents irritation and fits well under baby's nose for easier breathing.
title: NUK 3-in-1 Fashion Pacifier Clip 3-Pack - Girls

Plus, they'll love wearing Disney characters Mickey Mouse, and Jake and the Never Land Pirates. When your baby is ready to move on from diapers, help them continue learning with Pull-Ups Training Pants. Available in sizes 2T-3T (18-34 Pounds.), 3T-4T (32-40 Pounds.) and 4T-5T (38-50 Pounds.). description: Moms know there's nothing more wonderful than a calm, content baby so tommee tippee has developed a new collection of pacifiers that are approved by babies. So when you need to turn screams and sobs into smiles and sleep, simply pick up a Closer to Nature pacifier.  Colors/Styles may vary, item chosen at random at time of shipping.  TheTommee Tippee Closer to Nature 6-18 Months Orthodontic Pacifiers 2 Pack - Flowers (Colors/Styles May Vary) Features:   Pacifier with traditional shield style featuring understated designs, ideal for newborn babies and everyday use   Symmetrical orthodontic shape designed to support natural oral development   Reversible pacifier nipple making it easier for babies to correctly insert the pacifier   The nipple shape on the pacifier is more like a bottle nipple for a more familiar feeling for a baby   All pacifiers BPA-free for ultimate reassurance    Tommee Tippee is the number one brand of infant and toddler feeding products in Great Britain. Since 1965, Tommee Tippee has earned a reputation for its clever ideas, product quality and simply intuitive designs that promote natural development at every age, stage and feeding need. These smart ideas have earned the company top ranks in the prestigious Mother and Baby awards - a head-to-head assessment of competitive products voted on by moms themselves. In fact, The Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature line of baby bottles has been chosen as Great Britain's best baby bottle winning the Gold Award in 2006/7, 2008/9 and again in 2009/10.  Today, Tommee Tippee innovations provide comfort for babies and peace of mind for parents in 45 countries around the world.
title: Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature 6-18 Months Orthodontic Pacifiers 2 Pack - Flowers (Colors/Styles May Vary)

description: This piece of artwork by Trademark Art is printed using Giclee (jee-clay), an advanced printmaking process for creating high quality fine art reproductions. The attainable excellence that Giclee printmaking affords makes the reproduction virtually indistinguishable from the original piece. The result is wide acceptance of Giclee by galleries, museums, and private collectors. Gallery wrap is a method of stretching an artist's canvas so that the canvas wraps around the sides and is secured a hidden, wooden frame. This method of stretching and preparing a canvas allows for a frameless presentation of the finished artwork.

description: SwaddleLite is a set of 3 premium Marquisette Swaddling blankets. SwaddleDesigns marquisette blankets are crafted from cotton that is superior in length, strength and fineness to create a very soft and high quality fabric. Marquisette (mar-kwuh-set) is very lightweight and open weave which allows for airflow. It is ideal for swaddling in warmer climates and environments. New parents love the exclusive 123 Swaddle label with easy how-to-swaddle steps sewn to the edge of the blanket. SwaddleDesigns breathable marquisette swaddling blankets are generously sized at 46 x 46 inches. The blankets are an excellent value and have a multitude of uses beyond swaddling, such as a privacy throw when breastfeeding, a play mat for tummy time, or a shield over the stroller to protect from the sun or cool breeze. Each set offers blankets in 3 different and complementary prints. Boats & Fish Lite includes our Sailboats, Mod Circles, and Striped Fish swaddling blankets. Machine washable. Imported.

description: Introducing the new Munchkin LATCH pacifier - designed with pediatric dentists and moms to comfortably soothe your baby. The new LATCH pacifier is a one-piece silicone pacifier that is lightweight so it easily stays in baby's mouth. The natural shaped nipple and heart-shaped shield fit perfectly in baby's mouth. Pacifiers are a go-to soothing device for parents of newborns. The LATCH pacifier was designed with pediatric dentists and moms, with a goal of developing a lightweight, more comfortable pacifier for baby. First - it's a one piece silicone pacifier that is more lightweight than the leading one piece silicone pacifier. This allows baby to easily keep in her mouth. Secondly, it has a natural shape nipple for a more natural latch. Finally, it has a heart-shaped shield to comfortably fit under baby's nose. This innovative pacifier will surely be a staple in your baby-soothing routine.
title: Munchkin LATCH 0+ Months 2 Pack Pacifier - Green/Orange

description: Everything you need to know about feeding your baby solids! Award winning and pediatrician recommended, Sage Spoonfuls - Simple Recipes, Healthy Meals, Happy Babies provides recipes, information and ideas from one busy mom to another! This 227 page, easy-to-follow, beautifully designed book, includes everything you need to know about introducing and feeding your baby solids, including family favorite recipes the entire family, babies and toddlers included, can enjoy together! Here you will also find the most up-to-date information on food allergies, nutrition, foods to avoid, no-cook purees, infant CPR and emergency choking care, organics and much more! There is even a journal section after each age group to keep track of your baby's favorite foods. Baby food doesn't need to be fancy, this book is filled with 66 deliciously simple recipes and hundreds of yummy food combinations to fit every baby's needs. The fun commentary and colorful photos will keep you excited about making your baby the healthiest meals possible! Spiral bound, hard cover. Winner of the Mom's Best Literary Gold Award, Silver Medal Independant Publisher's Award and Parent Tested, Parent Approved Seal!
title: Sage Spoonfuls Simple Recipes, Healthy Meals, Happy Babies Hardcover Book

description: Add a splash of Kolor to your nursery with the Dekor Kolor Plus Diaper Pail. The Dekor Plus pail you love is now in designer colors to coordinate with your nursery! The Dekor Plus pail holds up to 60 newborn diapers before needing to be emptied, and is truly hands free.   The Dekor Kolor Plus Diaper Pail features:   A double sealing system that keeps odors in the pail. Dekor has the largest capacity of most major diaper disposal systems on the market. The continuous liner further helps to keep odors in the pail where they belong. Plus with the continuous liner - you use just what you need - not a pre-set size  ABS plastic will not absorb odors like cheaper pails, but Dekor is not overpriced either! The trap door has a lock off to keep curious toddlers out of the pail, but it is hidden beneath the lid so they are less likely to figure it out!   The Dekor pail is easy to empty and easy to replace the Refill. Each Refill liner holds up to 60 newborn diapers. Want lasting value, use your Dekor pail as a trash can later by simply removing the diaper insert! Have pets? Use Dekor for your cat litter. Want to cloth diaper your child? Dekor now offers a convenient two pack of Cloth Diaper Liners (sold separately). The liners' fresh baby powder scent further helps to keep your nursery smelling sweet. Each Dekor pail comes with the first Refill included. The pail is ready to use - no assembly needed - just take it out and you are ready to go     Beautiful, elegant, and a great value - that's a lot from a diaper disposal system - but Dekor delivers!
title: Diaper Dekor Kolor Plus Diaper Pail - Gray

description: This Philips AVENT SCF784/00 12oz My Natural Drinking Cup makes it easier for your toddler to transition from bottles and sippy cups to grown up drinking--without the mess. Ideal for toddlers 12 months and up, this spoutless cup features a unique spill-proof valve that's lip activated. The My Natural Drinking Cup is a great first grown up drinking cup for toddlers ready to move on from traditional sippy cups or from drinking from a straw. The cup allows drinking from all around the rim, just like an adult cup! This design encourages your toddler to get used to grown up drinking. This cup features a spill-proof valve that prevents waste and mess. The fast-flow valve is activated when a child's top lip presses against the lid, so milk or water only flows when your toddler is ready to drink! When the cup isn't in use, you won't have to worry about spills and messes, as it includes a separate hygienic lid to keep the cup and its contents clean, whether at home or on the go. To encourage independent drinking, this cup has special trainer handles toddlers can easily grip. Safe for toddlers, this cup is BPA-Free and is also dishwasher safe for easy cleanup and sterilization.
title: Philips AVENT My Natural Drinking 12 Ounce Cup - Blue

description: When you're expecting a baby even simple things quickly become more complicated than you ever thought possible. At Tommee Tippee we think choosing the right bottle is one thing you shouldn't have to worry about. Other bottles talk about latch-on, breast-like or reducing air. The Tommee Tippee Ultra bottle has it all.   The Ultra bottle delivers you a natural breast-like latch, a perfectly secure seal and angled position for a continuous milk flow resulting in a perfect feeding experience  Ultra, the only baby bottle you will ever need.  For the ultimate latch, seal and flow  The Tommee Tippee Ultra 2 Pack Fast Flow Nipples Features:   2 x Medium flow nipples suitable for use with the Tommee Tippee Ultra Feeding Bottles   Breast-like shape nipple for a natural latch and easy switching between breast and bottle   Contour zone on nipple allows for a secure seal reducing air intake and dribbles   Revolutionary, offset nipple angles the bottle for a smooth milk flow   Nipples are available to purchase in slow, medium and fast flow rates    Tommee Tippee is the number one brand of infant and toddler feeding products in Great Britain. Since 1965, Tommee Tippee has earned a reputation for its clever ideas, product quality and simply intuitive designs that promote natural development at every age, stage and feeding need. These smart ideas have earned the company top ranks in the prestigious Mother and Baby awards - a head-to-head assessment of competitive products voted on by moms themselves. In fact, The Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature line of baby bottles has been chosen as Great Britain's best baby bottle winning the Gold Award in 2006/7, 2008/9 and again in 2009/10.  Today, Tommee Tippee innovations provide comfort for babies and peace of mind for parents in 45 countries around the world.
title: Tommee Tippee Ultra 2 Pack Fast Flow Nipples

description: LEGO Battles: Ninjago is the follow-up to the highly successful LEGO Battles videogame from the award-winning publishing team behind LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 and LEGO Batman. LEGO Battles: Ninjago throws gamers into the midst of an exciting adventure where heroes combat evil to recover powerful Ninja weapons and restore harmony to the world. Along the way, gamers will encounter dragons, heroic Ninja battles and learn to master Spinjitzu - an art form in which players spin into a turbulent tornado to defeat enemies.  In LEGO Battles: Ninjago, Nintendo DS players will build an army and use Ninja fighting skills to overcome sinister Skeleton adversaries in a 1-2 player strategy action adventure. The game features six battle modes in addition to two favorites from the original LEGO Battles game. Gamers can test their skills in a single-player campaign or challenge a friend in thrilling local wireless DS multiplayer showdowns, battling as either the Spinjitzu heroes or Skeleton villains or the bonus hidden hero characters to see whose army will dominate. Gamers will spin and battle through adventures to become a Ninja legend in LEGO Battles: Ninjago.  LEGO Battles: Ninjago complements the recently released LEGO Ninjago construction sets, as well as a new Ninjago world within the LEGO Universe MMOG.  Game Features:   LEGO Battles Ninjago features six distinct battle modes, four of which are multiplayer battles with two fan-favorites from the original LEGO Battles for maximum replay value.   Players can upgrade hero units to unleash magical spells and create the ultimate personalized LEGO army.   Gamers will master the Ninja art of Spinjitzu and unlock Hidden Heroes from favorite LEGO toy lines to cast special attacks!   Multiplayer mode allows players to battle against their friends and family using local DS wireless multi-card play.
title: LEGO Battles Ninjago for Nintendo DS

description: While the gameplay of for Crown and Kingdom is simple, winning is not. Before play, the players arrange the modular board, resulting in a different environment for each game. Then all the players take turns placing their five characters on the board. On a player's turn, she may first spend money to purchase a Bribe. Depending on the amount spent, the player cfan modify their movement on their turn, activate an additional character or return an imprisoned character to the board. The player then must move one of their characters around the board a number of spaces equal to the number of characters in the starting region. Once the character reaches its new region, its power is activated. The different powers enable the players to earn coins, take coins from the other players, remove other characters from the board, make use of a region's special ability and place a support flag. As the board changes after every player's movement, the players have constantly evolving options on their turns. The first player to add a support flag of their color to every region wins the game.  The Rio Grande Games for Crown and Kingdom Board Game Features:   For 2-4 Players   30-60 minute playing time   Great strategy game with high replay value
title: Rio Grande Games for Crown and Kingdom Board Game

description: What if you could loop back in time to save a Tragedy? Tragedy Looper, a time-loop deduction Board Game. A Mastermind will unfold a mystery while the Protagonists try to figure out what is going on. As a Protagonist, your goal is to break out of the time loop maze and create a happy future. But you don't know who is who, what is what, and you don't even know how to win! However, you have the ability to travel back in time so you can replay the same script multiple times! As a Mastermind, your goal is to trigger tragedies and feast your eyes upon the misery of your opponents. You have all the information, but you have to win every single loop. And when the Protagonists lose, the taste of victory is so much sweeter!  The Z-Man Games Tragedy Looper Board Game Features:   For 2-4 Players   120 minute playing time   High quality components    Game publisher Z-Man Games, Inc. was formed in 1999 by Zev Shlasinger to bring back collectible card game Shadowfist. Since then, Z-Man Games has published more than 100 games. Z-Man Games' award-winning library includes board games, card games, and role-playing games.
title: Z-Man Games Tragedy Looper Board Game

description: In this Jenga : Disney Frozen Edition game, players take turns building up Elsa's ice palace. Then they try to stack the blocks to build the palace on top of the ice wall. But they need to watch out! If the balcony falls at any point during a turn, that player's out! description: "PROUD, CLEVER, AFFECTIONATE, AMUSING...MEET THE DACHSHUND!   The Dachshund is a lively breed with a friendly personality and a keen sense of smell. Known for their long and low bodies, they are one of the most popular dog breeds. The name ""dachshund"" is of German origin and literally means ""badger dog,"" from Dachs ""badger"" and Hund ""dog"". First bred in the early 1600's in Germany, the breed became popular in the U.S. during the early 1900's. They are loveable, playful companions, and an ideal pet for many homes!  Increase your rent by buying Toys for your dogs and upgrading them to Big Bones. Sounds easy enough until you get fleas, have an accident on the carpet, or worse yet, get sent to the kennel! So grab your token and advance to go Dachshunds! Who knows! You may soon be Best in Show...or marching in the Dog Parade! Whatever happens, keep your wag on!  For 2 - 6 players, ages 8 and up.  Includes directions for traditional play and for the one hour version as well!"""
title: Dachshund-opoly Board Game

description: "Your little one will love our Fisher-Price Grow with Me Barbie Inline Skates. Featuring the popular Barbie license, the ""1,2,3"" inline skates have styling with inline wheels. They feature rear ""training"" wheels for balance and realistic-looking high boot. The ""1-2-3"" learn-to-skate feature will help your child go from beginner to PRO!  Since 1930,  Fisher-Price  has been in business to create toys that fascinate and stimulate a child's imagination.  Fisher-Price  was founded in 1930, hardly the best time to launch a new business as the shadows of the Depression still loomed over American business. Still, Herman Fisher, Irving Price and Helen Schelle combined their diverse manufacturing and retailing experience to create a toy company and confidently brought 16 wooden toys to the International Toy Fair in New York City. The whimsical nature and magical surprises of those first  Fisher-Price  toys quickly caught on and became the hallmarks of  Fisher-Price  ever since.  Fisher-Price  believes in the potential of children and in the importance of a supportive environment in which they can grow, learn, and get the best possible start in life.  Fisher-Price  supports today's families with young children through our breadth of products that includes GeoTrax, Imaginext, Little People, Laugh and Learn, Thomas the Tank, Thomas and Friends, Elmo, Dora the Explorer, Go Diego Go, Sesame Street, Smart Cycle, Ni Hao Kai-Lan, Toy Story and other learning toys and pretend play items."
title: Fisher-Price Grow with Me Barbie Inline Skates

description: With their recent rise in popularity, everyone is making a boat shoe  but not like this one. To make this traditional slip-on extraordinary, we outfitted it in Horween's Chromexcel leather, which is made using a recipe that's close to 100 years old. Not only does this tanning process result in the softest of materials that molds to your foot, but it also seals the leather so that it stays supple even when it goes from wet to dry so they always feel as comfortable as they did right out of the box. This theme of taking what's old and making it new can also be seen in how we've chosen the traditional look of the handsewn vamp, leather lacing, and two-eyelet instep and given it a fresh update by offering it in a variety of colors so that not only does it fit and weather like no other boat shoe but it also looks like one of a kind.    Slip-on boat shoe  Classic boat shoe silhouette  Viner white boat sole  Handsewn construction  -   212 steps of Craftsmanship    Manufactured on the Handsewn 555 Last -   All about Lasts    Made in the Dominican Republic
title: Maritime Boat Shoes

The Vibram-#174; Roccia Block sole provides the traction you need to get you from camp to camp, and even allows you to stroll through the city streets to work on casual Friday. The leather just gets softer over time, molding and conforming to your very own specially-shaped foot. Whether you're a plaid-wrapped hipster or just gotta get from work to the trail in a flash, the Wilderness Boots are a classic that will get the job done. description: With their recent rise in popularity, everyone is making a boat shoe  but not like this one. To make this traditional slip-on extraordinary, we outfitted it in Horween's Chromexcel leather, which is made using a recipe that's close to 100 years old. Not only does this tanning process result in the softest of materials that molds to your foot, but it also seals the leather so that it stays supple even when it goes from wet to dry so they always feel as comfortable as they did right out of the box. This theme of taking what's old and making it new can also be seen in how we've chosen the traditional look of the handsewn vamp, leather lacing, and two-eyelet instep and given it a fresh update by offering it in a variety of colors so that not only does it fit and weather like no other boat shoe but it also looks like one of a kind.    Slip-on boat shoe  Classic boat shoe silhouette  Viner white boat sole  Handsewn construction  -   212 steps of Craftsmanship    Manufactured on the Handsewn 555 Last -   All about Lasts    Made in the Dominican Republic
title: Maritime Boat Shoes

description: When some guys were stealing their sister's pants to look cool, Kuhl was busy developing bad ass pants for the man who climbs mountains, fights bears, and definitely takes no crap from anyone. Made out of Tufflex, which is a durable woven stretch softshell with a soft brushed back for comfort. This incredible versatile fabric is lightweight, quick drying, wrinkle resistant, and has a UPF 50 sun protection rating, protecting you from those harsh UV rays. All Kuhl's Athletic Fit pants feature the Born Free Gusseted crotch, articulated knees, and generously cut thighs to create true unrestricted movement. The Renegade Pant is so comfortable you'll think you are wearing sweatpants. You're indeed wearing a pant that is comfortable climbing, hiking, and traveling the world. If you decide to go hiking or backpacking, there are plenty of pockets to store any gear you'll require. Below the front hand pockets are zippered mesh pockets that will double as vents. With the KhlAir vent system you can reduce your skin temperature by venting through the mesh pockets, not to mention its ability to wick moisture all during activity and quick dry afterwards. So go ahead, shave with the tip of an axe, and build a convertible out of twigs and gum. But most of all...give your sister back her pants.     Products on Sale are Discontinued Styles or Colors.      FEATURES of the Kuhl Men's Renegade Pant   UPF 50  Durable 4-way stretch fabric has brushed back and dries quickly for comfort  Very lightweight, great for hot weather and vigorous outdoor activity  Soft-shell fabric is UPF 40, wrinkle resistant, and dries quickly  Kuhlair vent system keeps skin cool  Kuhl's signature Athletic Fit pants feature the gusseted crotch and articulated knees, and are also cut generously in the thigh to offer unbeatable, unrestricted movementPant  Double needle bar tacks at critical junctions for reinforcement  Cell phone pocket securely holds phone and helps keep you organized  Easy care, wash and wear
title: Kuhl Renegade Pant - Mens

description: The Kuhl Men's Revolvr Pant takes what we love about Kuhl's technology and molds it into the ultimate everyday pant. The Uberkuhl technical fabric is the blending of nylon into the ultralight combed canvas to give you the lightweight comfort and breathability of cotton with the added durability of nylon. The Free Ryde Waist follows the natural contour of the human body, and features a longer length from belt top to crotch for extra room to extend your range. The Revolvr Pant also has a full seat and thigh for a more relaxed fit, imported Italian Fiocchi snaps, articulated knees and a gusseted crotch, giving you unparalleled freedom of movement and comfort. The patina dye and river wash create a great vintage appearance, taking these pants to a higher level of everyday wear and style.    FEATURES of the Kuhl Men's Revolvr Pant   Full seat and thigh for a more relaxed fit  Uber light and quickdry fabric for comfort  Vintage Patina Dye and river wash create a great vintage appearance  Cell phone pocket for reliable convenience and hold  Lightweight nylon/cotton blend fabric  Uberkhl provides the comfort of cotton and the quick dry of a technical fabric with unmatched breathability  Free Ryde Waist follows the natural contour of the human body, and features a longer length from belt top to crotch for extra room to extend your range  Imported Fiocchi Snaps from Italy lay flat against the body with no stem to dig into your waist and has been custom engineered to increase the closure strength  Born Free Gusseted crotch for freedom of movement  Articulated knees to allow you full range of motion  Double layer scuff-guard at cuffs and pockets for enhanced durability  Easy care, wash and wear. Kuhl develops their own exclusive fabrics that will not shrink
title: Kuhl Revolvr Pant - Mens

description: The Arc'Teryx Women's Beta AR Pant is a waterproof pant for spending time in the wet outdoors. The very wet outdoors can be great too, with the proper gear on. GORE-TEX-#174 Pro with N40r-X face fabric plus N80p-X in high-wear areas gives you the pass you need to frolic in the backwoods, up in the mountains, and wherever else it may rain, snow, sleet and just get downright dreary. The 3/4 length WaterTight-#8482 leg zips make life a little simpler when it starts to pour, going easily over boots and crampons. Loop the hook onto your laces and the pant stays put when you're trudging through the snow, and the Keprotec-#8482 instep patches protect against all things sharp, like crampons and ski edges. An integrated belt to keep them from falling and a zippered pocket for your handy-dandy compass are small but essential features you'll be glad you have when you're on the trail.    FEATURES of the Arcteryx Women's Beta AR Pant   Highly breathable Gore-Tex Pro; N40r-X face fabric, a lightweight ripstop face fabric that is tough and supple, is used on the front of legs, hardwearing N80p-X face fabric in high wear areas  3/4 length WaterTight side zippers with back flaps ensure easy removal over boots and crampons  Adjustable webbing belt, zip fly with snap  Single zippered hip pocket  Keprotec instep patch protects against edges, crampons and boots  Cordura PowderCuff; lace hook affixes pant to boot  Micro-seam allowance (1.6 mm) reduces bulk and weight  Arcteryx Nu water repellent treatment  Articulated knees and gusseted crotch  Athletic fit ensures optimal ventilation with comfort and mobility  Adjustable pant cuff drawcord  Keprotec instep patches provide superior protection against damage by boots, crampons and ski edges  Reinforced knees, seat and lower legs  Powdercuff, with elastic and lace hook, keeps snow out
title: Arcteryx Beta AR Pant - Womens

description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You wont just be looking great and worrying less, youll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.
title: Daily Grind Limited Edition

description: Close to home! Rep your hometown while sporting classic style when you don this Chitown Clothing Chi baseball tee.    Cotton    Crewneck    Short sleeves    CHI baseball graphic    Made in the U.S.A.Founded in 2009, Chitown Clothing is a Chicago-based apparel company that aims to capture this great citys creativity, wit, history and rich culture through super soft t-shirts and meticulously designed graphics. Married couple Kevin and Sara Kasarski created Chitown Clothing in order to combine civic pride with their entrepreneurial spirit. They took their backgrounds, his in graphic design and hers in marketing, and started stocking a few designs in the closet of their small apartment. Seven years later, the company has come a long way from the tiny closet, having expanded to offer dozens of original t-shirts, sweatshirts, tote bags, stickers and more. Their designs are sold online and in boutiques throughout the Chicagoland area and have been featured in several publications.
title: Chitown Clothing Chi Baseball Tee

description: The Helly Hansen Men's Seven J Jacket is a fully waterproof jacket for outdoor adventure and everything in between. When the rain won't let up, the Seven J is an easy go-to, no matter what the occasion. The clean, classic look fits in just about anywhere. The regular fit is ready to be thrown on over a t-shirt or thicker base layer and won't be too baggy so you can steer clear of overhanging tree branches. The 2 ply fabric provides water and windproof protection while remaining breathable, preventing the clammy feeling on the inside. The quick-dry lining also helps combat the clams, wicking sweat away from your body and drying in a flash. The durable YKK zipper is covered by a storm flap at the front and the seams are fully sealed to prevent leaks. A fixed hood won't leave your neck soaked and features quick, one-hand adjustments. Two zippered hand pockets keep lip balm or energy bars at the ready when on the trial in a downpour.    Products on Sale are Discontinued Styles or Colors. title: Helly Hansen Seven J Jacket - Mens

To ensure unmatched traction the LaRomana siped boat sole features two different herringbone patterns that work together to grip even the slickest surfaces, making this shoe great for the avid sailor or amateur boatman alike. For those who prefer dry land, this warm-weather style features handsome rawhide lacing and handsewn stitching that pairs nicely with khakis, jeans or shorts. The two screen eyelets provide ventilation while 2592-Last design provides room in the rounded toe, ensuring the Eastport will provide you with a comfortable fit whether you are lowering the boom on your sailboat or just raising a glass on your back deck. description: Why was Boulder, Colorado named the happiest place to live in the United States?  Could it be because the city is surrounded by acres and acres of open spaces and situated in one of the most beautiful valleys in the Rocky Mountains? Or maybe it is just because everyone is wearing the town's namesake, incredibly comfortable moccasins from the ae by Allen Edmonds collection.  This casual slip-on loafer is a joy to slide your foot in and out of, while you'll be ecstatic with the protection and traction afforded you by the unlined mudguards and the array of curved grooves on the bottom of its Blues rubber sole.  Also you'll sure be glad we crafted this driving shoe with handsome design features like the two-tone leather body and contrast stitching, both of which look cool whether you are hanging out or going out.  A joy to wear and look at, the Boulder will put a smile on your face no matter where you call home.    Rubber sole men's slip-on loafer casual shoes  Moc-toe venetian style driving moccasins  Part of the ae by Allen Edmonds Collection of premium men's shoes  Handsewn unlined leather upper  Blues rubber sole  Handsewn construction  -   212 steps of Craftsmanship    Manufactured on the Handsewn 145Last -   All about Lasts    Made in the Dominican Republic

description: The Fjallraven Men's Vidda Pro Trousers is a durable pant for spending time on the trails of the forest, mountains and fields. Reinforced at the seat and knees, so don't be afraid to kneel on the ground to get your tent staked out just right. Or maybe you need to sit down on that fallen log and take a load off for a minute. Fjallraven has added a total of 7 pockets, so you have a spot for just about everything, including your axe. All that is left is to grow a beard because you're a mountain man while wearing these pants. description: The Arc'teryx Women's Solita Pant is a training pant for warm ups and cool downs at the gym. The three quarter length side zippers allow for easy on and off when you've already got your running shoes on. The athletic fit is cut closer to the body to keep fabric clear of gym equipment, while still allowing a light short underneath. The material is soft to the touch and stretchy for movement, so you won't have any resistance during lunges and other stretches. A durable water repellent finish on the outside fabric beads water up on the surface to prevent soaking in of a light rain, or a splash from your water bottle. The hand pockets secure your gym membership and phone with zippered closures.    FEATURES of the Arcteryx Women's Solita Pant   Lightweight, air permeable woven fabric with mechancial stretch and DWR finish to repel moisture  Wide, knit waist band for comfort  3/4 length side zips enable easy removal over running shoes, locking zipper sliders at ankle  Two hand pockets, one pocket contains an interior key pocket  Articulated patterning for unrestricted mobility and gusseted crotch  Adjustable elastic waist drawcord

description: From Ritani, French-set diamonds are open on the sides to allow in more light and create additional sparkle to highlight your choice of center diamond. You'll notice exquisite detailing on the sides of the diamond setting. Diamonds and precious metal make her sparkle and shine. As opposed to prongs, French-set diamonds are set closely together with exposed sides to allow more light to enter each diamond, creating maximum sparkle. The diamond is also held by a gleaming bead of metal that is carefully placed by the jeweler. French setting allows the spacing between the diamonds to be very close, creating a beautiful line of brilliance. Diamonds are 1/4ctw, H or better in color, and VS in clarity. This 14k white gold semi-mount comes with a 1ct round cubic zirconia that can be replaced with any stone of the same proportions. Each Ritani semi-mount is available in a variety of options including: Metal type Total diamond carat weight Center stone shape, size and type Ring size If the feature that you are looking for is not part of this particular style, please contact us to place a special order.

description: If youre looking for a nutritional supplement that has been formulated with feline health in mind Rx Vitamins for Pets Rx Essentials for Cats Powder may be right for you and your pet.    First this powder contains a wide array of vitamins and minerals. For example vitamin A might work to maintain optimal night vision (which is important because cats are largely nocturnal animals) while potassium is involved in regulating muscle function.   In addition this Rx Vitamins for Pets supplement provides several antioxidants including spirulina (blue-green algae). As a result it may work to protect your cats cells from free radical damage.    Moreover every serving of Rx Essentials for Cats Powder provides milk thistle which is an herb that might play a role in maintaining optimal liver function.    Finally Rx Essentials for Cats Powder is versatile because you can mix it into wet or dry cat food!    Each four-ounce bottle of Rx Essentials for Cats Powder by Rx Vitamins for Pets should last for about one-and-a-half months at the recommended serving size of one-half of a teaspoon daily.    These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). These products are not meant to diagnose treat or cure any disease or medical condition. Please consult your doctor before starting any exercise or nutritional supplement program or before using these or any product during pregnancy or if you have a serious medical condition.

The IT Luggage World's Lightest is constructed from high density polyester fabric and features a durable fiberglass frame with a sturdy locking handle system made from a single piece of aluminum. Available in a range of colors to suit your personal sense of style, this all-inclusive spinner rolling case offers style and storage while its featherweight design lets you travel with ease.
title: it luggage World's Lightest 8 Wheel 3 Piece Set
